div.ab: Jan. 1. 1793. Tu. Revise.

2. W. Revise, Write 2 pages. Holcroft calls. Sup at
Nicholson's , revise avec lui B. VIII, Chap. VIII .
3. Th. Call on Blair , nah. Jardine & Dyson call. Masters at tea. Indisposed. Bibliotheque de l'Homme Public, Utopia.

4. F. Revise: write 4 pages. Call on Davis
, best book that ever was published. Thucydides, 14 pages.
5. Sa. Revise: write 3 pages. Thucydides .

Jan. 6. Su. Call on Nicholson
. Revise. Dine at Holcroft's : adv. Dyson & Dibbin, talk of plagiarism, abstraction & ideas; Kearsley
. Masters sleeps; advise him on pursuits & baptism .
Fenwick calls, nah
.
7. M. Preface, 5 pages: revise.

8. Tu. Call on Barry (reads his pamphlet),
mrs Inchbald nah &
Davis
: Dine at Holcroft's
. Revise.

9. W.
Jardine calls. Call on Robinson
. Indisposed apr√®s .Read cursorily Chatham, V. III, 70 pages; & Benev. Quixote, 150 . Fenwick tea & supper.
10. Th. Revise. Read Pol. Justice, 18 pages: finish C Chatham, Vol. III. Sup at Nicholson's , revise Preface avec lui , applauds dissimulation .
11. F. Write 2 pages. Pol. Justice, 78 pages. Ben. Quixote, 84 pages. Dyson at tea. Laxness.
12. Sa. Read Dunstan. Pol. Justice, 23 pages: Sublime, Pt. V, 32 pages.

Jan. 13. Su. Meditation. Pol. Justice, 30 pages. Dine at
Holcroft's : adv. Murray perruquier
. Paradise's, Gillies, Planta, Ingenhousz

14. M. Call on mrs Inchbald
&
B Hollis , nah. Pol. Justice, 103 pages: Pamphlet by an Old Whig . Sup at miss Godwin's , talk of mild firmness .

15. Tu. Fever. Pol. Justice, 19 pages.
Fenwick
matin . Sup at Holcroft's
.
Louis guilty, 693 to 26: Appeal 280 to 424
16. W. Write Mucius, Letter 1. Pol. Justice, 69 pages. Jardine calls: Fenwick calls.

17. Th. Mucius, Letters 2 & 3. Pol. Justice, 13 pages. Call on Holcroft
&
Gray
. Appeal, 283 Death, 366 to 321

18. F. Mucius, Letter 4. Pol. Justice, 25 pages. Tea mrs Inchbald's
: sup at Nicholson's , with a new paragraph sur lui , discuss his motives .

19. Sa. Mucius, Letter 2 1/2 pages. Call on W Morgan
: write to Franklin . Pol. Justice, Vol. II, 18 pages: First of July, a Comedy by E. T.
Delay 310 to 380
Jan. 20. Su. Mucius, Letter 2 1/2 pages. Dine at H Tooke's , with Holcroft, Sharpe, Banks & Jardine .

21. M.
Stuart calls. Write to Morgan . Miss Godwin dines: Masters au soir.
Execution of Louis

22. Tu. Call on Chauvelin
(see Renaud), Holcroft & Davis : meet Perry . Write to National Convention & Norman : paragraph in preface. Sup at Nicholson's
.
23. W. Pol. Justice, 38 pages. Jardine & Fenwick at tea.

24. Th. Pol. Justice, 168 pages: H Tooke's Trial: Vaughan on War, 78 pages.
Chauvelin directed to withdraw

25. F. Pol. Justice, 161 pages. Call on Holcroft
,
Davis
&
Pinard
.

26. Sa. Pol. Justice, 93 pages. Transcribe letter to Nat. Convention, &c. Call on Davis
: tea at Jardine's , with Restiff, talk of Louis & law .

Jan. 27. Su. Carry my book to Chauvelin's . Errata. John Godwin calls. Dine at Holcroft's
: read the Amorous Baronet.

28. M. Notes on A. B. Dine at
Holcroft‚Äôs
, adv. Merget . Fox‚Äôs pamphlet .
Loughborough, chancellor : Erskine & Pigot dismissed.

29. Tu. Call on Robinson
&
Davis
. Finish Pol. Justice.
Play, Every one has his Fault, with Robinson, Murphy, Davis & Chalmers . Sup at Holcroft's
.
30. W. Write to Jardine & miss Cooper . Finish Vaughan on War, 32 pages: McIntosh to Pitt: Virgil, vs 198: Hume's Essays, IV, V, 8 pages.
31. Th. Walk ad Dom. Com. Hume on Morals, 33 pages: Virgil, vs 163: Dehors Trompeurs, actes 1 & 2.

Feb. 1. F. Walk ad Dom. Com. Hume on Morals, 24 pages: Virgil, vs 192: finish Dehors Trompeurs: Embarras du Choix, actes 1 & 2.
Dyson
. War decreed

2. Sa. Call on Robinson
. Tea Jardine's , w. Fenwick : Fenwick sups. Embarras du Choix, actes 3 & 4.

Feb. 3. Su. Dine at Holcroft's : adv. Jardine, Fenwick & Mercier
. Virgil, 152, end of B. IV.

4. M. Call on Robinson
,
Nicholson
&
Holcroft
. Jardine, Fenwick, Symonds & Pearson at tea: Fenwick sups.

5. Tu. Call on Robinson
. See the Mourning Bride: sup at Holcroft's
. Finish Embarras du Choix.
6. W. Call on Nicholson , with Holcroft; talk of disparaging my book . Amorous Baronet. N. promises to write to R.

7. Th. Call on Robinson (sign agreement & accounts), //
Holcroft
&
mrs Inchbald
. Sup at miss Godwin's
.
8. F. Accounts & papers. Ecole des Maris, act 1.

9. Sa.
Holcroft's review of D. Stewart . Jardine calls: Holcroft at tea. Sallust, 5 pages: Thucydides, 6 pages: Ecole des Maris, act 2/2.

Feb. 10. Su. Dine at Burney's , w. Jardine & Charles . Call at Wedgwood's , w. Jardine , see // John . Soir, Paradise's, Jardine, Planta, Lord Sandys, Adriani . Finish Ecole des Maris. Sallust, 2 pages}

11. M. Sallust, 2 pages. Call on Barry ; he had sought me to enquire after my book
.
12. Tu. Sallust, 4 pages: Ecole des Femmes, acts 1, 2, 3. Jardine calls. Indisposed.
13. W. Sallust, 2 pages: Hume 15 pages.

14. Th. Sallust, 3 pages: Hume 17 pages: Ecole des Femmes, act 4. Jardine calls. Holcroft at tea: go w. him to Jardine
, meet Restiff . Dyson calls, nah. Publication .
15. F. Ecole des Femmes, act 5. Dine at Wedgwood's , with Jardine, Allen & Tom, talk of Burke , Fox , revolutions, property & the foundation of morals .
16. Sa. Write on the Present War, 2 pages. Sallust, 1 page: Les Facheux .

Feb. 17. Su. Sallust 4 pages: Etourdi, acts 1 & 2. Dine at
Holcroft‚Äôs , adv. Belmano & Dyson
.
Paradise‚Äôs , Hawke, Ingenhousz, Planta, Gillies, Dornford: abused by madame
.
Call on Mrs Barlow}

18. M. Sallust, 3 pages. Dyson at tea: Barry's Lecture : sup at
Holcroft's
. Etourdi, act 3.

19. Tu. Sallust, 3 pages. Call on Inchbald
. Etourdi, act 4.

20. W. Call on Robinson
,
Holcroft
&
Barry
. Review Every one has his Fault for the Eu. Jardine & Symonds at tea.

21. Th. Read the Amorous Cynic. Wedgwood's Concert : sup at Holcroft's
.

22. F. Amorous Cynic: Holcroft at tea, sup at
Holcroft's
.

23. Sa. Sallust, 4 1/2 pages: Horace, Odes 1 & 2: Etourdi, act 5. Call on Davis
.

Feb. 24. Su. Write 1 page. Sallust, 2 pages. Horace, Ode 3. Dine at Holcroft's , talk of N's
// attack on moral character, & of juvenile coercion : adv. Murray Stephen .

25. M. Finish Sallust's Catiline, 2 pages: Cicero in Catilinam, Orat. I, ¬ß. 1 & 2. Tea at Marshal's , with Holcroft & Cooper .
Go to the Comedy of Anna, with Inchbald
.
Cooper for Portsmouth .

26. Tu. Catilinaria I, ¬ß. 3, 4, 5, 6: Voltaire's Life of Moli√®re. Call on Nicholson , discuss moral character . Dine at B Hollis's , with Holcroft, Heywood, Dyer & Disney . talk of Louis & gratitude .

27. W. Catilinaria I, ¬ß. 7: Middleton, 76 pages: Lettres Chinoises, Volt., 30 pages: Vie de Moli√©re, Anon., 80 pages. Call on Inchbald , talk of Sheridan & reading .
Fawcet calls, nah
tumour
28. Th. Finish Cat. I: Middleton, page 118: Vie de Mol., page 180.
Mar. 1. F. Horace, Odes 4, 5, 6: Middleton, page 209: Hume on Morals, 290 to 301: finish Vie de Mol., 314. Write to Masters . weather.
2. Sa. Write to Mrs Cooper . Cat. II, ¬ß. 1, 2, 3, 4: Horace, Ode 7: Middleton, p. 270: [Co?]cu Imaginaire . Jardine calls, nah.

Mar. 3. Su. Cat. II, ¬ß. 5, 6, 7, 8: Horace, Ode 8: Middleton, p. 284. Dine at Holcroft‚Äôs , adv. Dyson, talk of pleading & law
. Man as he is, p. 38.

4. M. Write to C.
Horace, Ode 9: Middleton, p. 292: Man as he is, p. 126. Dom. Com., Sheridan on insurrections , see Mcintosh & Gray .
5. Tu. Write 7 pages. Middleton, p. 351; Preface to do, 26 pages.

6. W. Write 2 pages. Finish Cat. II: Horace, Odes 10, 11: Middleton, p. 402: Man as he is, p. 215. Jardine calls.
Hull Godwin married
7. Th. Write 7 pages. Cat. III: finish Middleton, Vol. I, p. 423; Vol. II, p. 17: Man as he is, p. 219. Holcroft calls, with Review .
8. F. Write 5 1/2 pages. Middleton, p. 34: finish Man as he is, Vol. I, p. 288. Jardine calls.
9. Sa. Cat. IV, ¬ß. 1-5: Middleton, p. 71: Man as he is, p. 74.

Mar. 10. Su. Write 4 pages. Finish Cat. IV. Dyson & Dibbin call: advise the latter
. Dine at Holcrofts
: sup with him at Nicholson‚Äôs , talk with of necessity .
11. M. Write 4 1/2 pages. Middleton, p. 100: Man as he is, p. 104. Carry ms to Holcroft , supper .

12. Tu. Consult documents. Call on Holcroft
. Jardine at tea. Man as he is, p. 217.

13. W. Write 4 pages. Pro Rabirio: Man as he is, Vol. III, p. 12. Marshal at tea: sup at
miss Godwin‚Äôs
.

14. Th. Write 1 page. Middleton, p. 112: Man as he is, p. 105. Tea Jardine‚Äôs , with Holcrt & Swale : sup at Holcroft‚Äôs
.

15. F. Horace, Odes 12, 13, 14: Middleton, p. 204: Man as he is, p. 145. Call on
B. Hollis
&
Inchbald , nah.

16. Sa. Middleton, p. 234. Dine at Henley‚Äôs
; sup at miss Godwin‚Äôs , with Mrs Cooper ; mrs Mills .

Mar. 17. Su. De Bello Civili, ¬ß. 1-6: Middleton, p. 306. Dine at Holcroft‚Äôs
.
18. M. De Bello Civili, ¬ß. 6-13: Horace, Odes 16, 17, Epist. I: finish Middleton, Vol. II, p. 438: Man as he is, p. 209. Marshal at tea.

19. Tu. Horace, Ep. II: Turgot, p. 182-189: Man as he is, p. 227. Dr Lister calls, talk of reason & sentiment . Play, the Rival Sisters: sup at Holcroft‚Äôs , with Dyson ; letter, Griffith to Holcroft .

20. W. Rewrite Jardine‚Äôs Review for the Eu. Mag. Turgot, √ßa & la: Middleton, Vol. III, p. 6: Man as he is, fin. Vol. III, p. 275.
E. Mansfield dies.
21. Th. Horace, Ep. III, IV, V, VI: Pro S. Roscio, ¬ß. 1, 2, 3, 4: Middleton, p. 33. Jardine calls: call on Inchbald , escort : sup at Nicholson‚Äôs , talk of degeneracy .

22. F.
Jardine calls, tell him of spy & Nicholson
: sup at Davis‚Äôs , talk of innate . Horace, Ep. VII: Middleton, p. 70: Man as he is, Vol. IV, p. 42.

23. Sa. Horace, Ep. VIII, IX, X, XI, XII: Middleton, p. 156: Man as he is, p. 64. Call on Priestley
: meet Lindsay, M Street .

Mar. 24. Su. Horace, Ep. XIII, XIV, XV: Middleton, p. 176. Dine at
H. Tooke‚Äôs , with Zenobio, Sempil, Gawler, Knight, Harwood, Hamilton Rowan, Thelwal{,} Sharpe & Dyson .
25. M. Horace, Ep. XVI, XVII: Middleton, p. 240: Franklin‚Äôs Miscellanies ms, passim: Man as he is, p. 99. Marshal at supper.
26. Tu. Horace, Ep. XVIII, XIX: Middleton, p. 302: Vertot, Tom. III, p. 71-131: finish Man as he is, p. 272. Meet Fawcet .

27. W. Horace, Lib. II, Ep. I, vs. 138: Suetonius, J. C. ¬ß. 1-6: Middleton, p. 309. Marshal at tea: sup with him at miss Godwin‚Äôs
{.} Crusius‚Äôs Roman Poets, √ßa & la.

28. Th. Finish Ep. ad Augustum: Middleton, p. 350. Call on Holcroft
&
Barry
, see sir J Hort : tea Jardine‚Äôs , adv. Holcroft, Mendoza, Lugo & Restiff
: Sup at Holcroft‚Äôs w. Dyson .
29. F. Call on Robinson : propose Rom. Hist. Evening , mrs Inchbald‚Äôs . Finish Middleton, p. 380.
30. Sa. Horace, Ep. ad J. Florum. Dine at Holcroft‚Äôs , with Knight & Nicholson .

Mar. 31. Su. Suetonius, ¬ß. 6-16: Pictet to Woronzoff, p. 10. Dine at
Holcroft‚Äôs : adv. Dyson & Stephen
. Paradise‚Äôs, E. Pomfret, lady Say & Sele, Smirnhoff, Gillies, Russel, Bancroft .
Apr. 1. M. Horace, A. P., 239: Suetonius, ¬ß. 16-55: Vertot, p. 131-148: finish Pictet, p. 102.
2. Tu. Finish A. P., vs. 476: finish Suetonius, J. C. ¬ß. 89: Crusius‚Äôs Roman Poets, √ßa & la.
3. W. Horace, Lib. II, Sat. II. Play, False Colours.

4. Th. Call on Robinson
,
Holcroft
&
Barry
: meet B. Hollis . Rollin‚Äôs Rom. Hist. p. 30. Shakespeare Gallery:
Play, the Armourer.

5. F. Horace, Sat. III, vs. 103: Rollin, p. 42. Call on
Munnings , New Jail . Tea Nicholson‚Äôs , with Holcroft & Crawford, talk of associatns .
6. Sa. See Munnings‚Äôs creditor , fr. H Finish Sat. III, vs. 326: Rollin, p. 86: Preface to do, 60 pages.
Apr. 7. Su. Dine at Holcrofts , altercation .

8. M. Call on Robinson
,
Holcroft
&
Davis , respecting History . Horace, Sat. IV: Philosophie de l‚ÄôHist., p. 28: Rollin, p. 95.

9. Tu.
Rivers & Henley call. Horace, Sat. V: Rollin, p. 140: Universal Hist., 30 pages.
10. W. Horace, Sat. VI: Rollin, p. 154: Hooke, p. 101: Plutarch, Life of Romulus, 39 pp.

11. Th. Call on Robinson
,
Johnson
&
Munngs
,
Holcroft twice, nah. Horace, Sat. VII, vs. 52: // Count Fathom, p. 186.

12. F. Finish Horace, Sat. VII: Fathom, Vol. I, p. 262, Vol. II, p. 74.
Mrs Jardine calls: call on Jardine
&
Holcroft
.
13. Sa. Horace, Sat. VIII: Fathom, p. 180. Marshal breakfasts: Jardines call.

Apr. 14. Su. Horace, Lib. I, Sat. I: Fathom, p. 206. Dine at
Holcroft‚Äôs , with Pinard, talk of reading, no impression .

15. M.
J Hollis calls, talk of justice & mercy . Mort d‚ÄôAdam (Klo.): Mysterious Mother. Religious Courtship, p. 170-264.

16. Tu. Mort d‚ÄôAbel, Chant I & III:
Dyson at tea.
17. W. Horace, Sat. II: Mort d‚ÄôAbel, Chant IV: Roderic Random (Harr.), p. 118.

18. Th. Mort d‚ÄôAbel, Chant V & dernier. Call on Johnson
,
Munnings
&
Lister
: Play, How to Grow Rich.
19. F. 1/2 Winter‚Äôs Tale; 1/2 Othello: Britannicus, 3 acts: finish Random, Vol. I: Fathom, p. 240. Rivers & Jardine call.

20. Sa. Britannicus, acts 4, 5 & 1: finish Fathom, p. 315: Religious Courtship, p. 44. Call on Saumarez
: Marshal sups.

p.add: Fawcet, Fordyce, Barry, Stuart, Priestley, Logan, Holcroft, Nicholson, Sheridan, Dyson(,} Paine, Mackintosh, Tooke, Thelwal, Gerald, Porson, Parr.

div.ab:
Apr. 21. Su. Britannicus, acts 2 & 3: scenes of Shylock. J Godwin calls. Dine at Holcroft‚Äôs : adv. Pinard, talk of self-love & morale
.
22. M. Write 2 pages. Mirabeau, p. 286-368: Trenck the Pandour, 112 pages.

23. Tu. Write 2 pages. Mirabeau, p. 368-428, & 1-24. Play, the Fair Penitent; see Hereford , Kearsley , Dyson & Bicknel
. Derelic . Write to S. Munnings .

24. W. Britannicus, acts 4 & 5: Mirabeau, p. 54: Random, p. 142. Call on Scott
: dine at Holcroft‚Äôs , go with him to
Nicholson
. Stiff neck.

25. Th. Write 4 1/2 pages. Andromaque, acts 1 & 2. Sup at
Marshal‚Äôs
.

26. F. Write 1 1/2 pages. Horace, Sat. III, vs. 62: Preface to Knolles‚Äôs Turks. Jardine calls. Call on Munnings
: tea & supper, J Hollis
.
27. Sa. Write 5 pages. Finish Hor., Sat. III, vs. 142: Hume‚Äôs Henry 8, 2 chaps, perfuncte . Dyson at tea. Write to White .
Apr. 28. Su. Write 1 page. Andromaque, act 3: Fatal Curiosity, act 1: Hume, Vol. IV, p. 82-98: consult Wanley on Man . Dine at Holcroft‚Äôs , w. Pinard . Presentation
29. M. Write 4 pages. Horace, Sat. IV: Hume, p. 151: God‚Äôs Revenge, p. 24. Sup at miss Godwin‚Äôs , with miss Sparkes .
30. Tu. Write 1 page. Hume, p. 206: consult Anna St Ives.
May 1. W. Write 4 pages. Hume, p. 245. Call on Munnings , Adams Court : sup at Nicholson‚Äôs , talk of honesty, envy & plot .

2. Th. Write 2 pages. Horace, Sat. V, vs. 23: finish Hume‚Äôs Henry, p. 300: Roderic Random, p. 170: Herman d‚ÄôUnna, p. 104: consult Anna St Ives & Mort d‚ÄôAbel.
mal de t√™te

3. F. Write 1 page. Finish Horace, Sat. V, vs. 104. Marshal & Jardine call: mrs Cooper dines: sup at
miss Godwin‚Äôs
.
4. Sa. Andromaque, acts 4 & 5: Fatal Curiosity, acts 2 & 3: Random, p. 194: Herman, p. 150. Dyson dines. mal de t√™te .

May 5. Su. Random, p. 202: Herman, p. 209: Horace, Sat. VI. Dine at Holcroft‚Äôs
.

6. M. Write 3 pages. Call on Inchbald
. Random, p. 221: Herman, p. 314.

7. Tu. Call on Lister
, see J Hollis . Exhibition. Random, p. 252: Herman, p. 332; Vol. II, p. 31.

8. W. Call on Robinson , nah, &
Holcroft
. Finish Random, p. 262: Herman, p. 170. Cold.

9. Th. Call on Munnings
. J Hollis calls, nah: Marshal at tea. Moliere, Marriage Forc√©: Herman, p. 190.
10. F. Write 2 pages. Athalie, actes 1 & 2: Herman, p. 272. Jardine calls. Write to major White . Horace, Sat. VIII.

11. Sa. Write 3 pages. Herman, p. 302. Call on Robinson
, see Murphy , & L White . Munning dies; directions about the body : tea
miss God.‚Äôs
. Horace, Sat. IX. Mauvaise nuit .

May 12. Su. Write p. 37-43. Dine at Holcroft‚Äôs
: tea Marshal‚Äôs , with miss G., &c. Herman, p. 320. Mauvaise nuit . Hor., Sat. VII.

13. M. Write p. 43, 44/2. Horace, Sat. X: Per. Pickle, p. 28. Call on J Hollis
: meet B Hollis: Scott & Rivers at tea.

14. Tu. Horace, Lib. II, Sat. I: Pickle, p. 85. Munnings‚Äôs funeral : tea miss Godwin‚Äôs
{.} Call on Lister , nah.
15. W. Write p. 44/2, 45. Athalie, acts 1 3 & 4: Pickle, p. 123. Call on Lister , nah.
16. Th. Write p. 46-50. Horace, Odes 15, 18: Pickle, p. 161. Lister & Jardine at tea:

17. F. Write p. 50. Horace, Odes 19-23: Man of Feeling, p. 175-201: Pickle, p. 190. Tea Otton‚Äôs
.
May 19. Su. Write 54/2, 55/2. Horace, Odes 27, 28: Jno Godwin calls. Dine at H Tooke‚Äôs , with Gonzaga, Tooke, Harwood, Seward, Knight, Goring, Wathen, // Sharpe, Joice, Symonds & Dyson .

20. M. Write 55/2, 56, 57. Horace, Odes 29-33: Pickle, p. 366. Sup at miss Godwin‚Äôs
.

21. Tu. Write p. 58, 59, 60. Horace, Odes 33, 34, 35: //
finish Pickle, p. 385 & 410- 438: Grandison, 56 pages. Call on B Hollis , adv. Disney
.
22. W. Write p. 61, 62, 63. Horace, Odes 36, 37, 38: Grandison, p. 171-291. Dine at Marshal‚Äôs , with miss G. & mrs Milne . J Hollis calls.

23. Th. Write 5 lines. Horace, Lib. II, Odes 1: Grandison, p. 328; Vol. II, p. 68. Call on Inchbald
: Stuart & Holcroft call: sup at
Nicholson‚Äôs , w. Holct
.
24. F. Write p. 64, 65, 66. Horace, Odes 2, 3, 4: Grandison, 170 pages. Jardine & T Wedgwood call.
25. Sa. Write p. 67, 68, 69. Horace, Odes 5, 6, 7: Grandison, Vol. III, p. 36. Play, the Gamester. Prosecution of P. J. debated this week.

May 26. Su. Write p. 70, 71, 72. Horace, Odes 8-12: Grandison, p. 92. Dine at Holcrofts
: call on Paradise
&
Mrs Barlow , nah.

27. M. Horace, Odes 12-16: Grandison, p. 98: Duplicity, acts 1, 2, 3. Call on Lister
: Orleans Gallery: tea T. Wedgwood
.

28. Tu. Horace, Odes 16, 17, 18: Grandison, p. 242: finish Duplicity. Call on Lindsey
,
Symonds nah,
Scott
&
Barry
. Stuart calls.
Marshal‚Äôs criticism .
29. W. Odes 19, 20; Lib. III, Ode I: Pro S. Roscio, ¬ß. 1-6: Grandison, p. 282; Vol. IV, p. 20: Gamester, acts 1, 2, 3.
30. Th. Write p. 73-78. Horace, Odes 2, 3: Pro S. Roscio, ¬ß. 6-11: Grandison, p. 90: finish Gamester: consult Shylock.
31. F. Write p. 78, 79. Horace, Ode 4: Pro Roscio, ¬ß. 11-16: Athalie, act 5: Grandison, p. 188. Jardine & Melanscheg call.
June 1. Sa. Write p. 80, 81, 82. Horace, Odes 5, 6: Pro Roscio, ¬ß. 16-21: Athalie, act 1: Grandison, p. 282: Noble Peasant. Medicine, 6 days.

Ma June 2. Su. Horace, Odes 7-11: Coriolanus, acts 1 & 2. Dine at
Holcroft‚Äôs
: call with him on Symonds
,
Grecian
;
T Kearsley
.
3. M. Horace, Odes 11-15: Pro Roscio, ¬ß. 21-31: finish Coriolanus: Timon, act 1: Grandison, Vol. V, p. 142.

4. Tu. Horace, Odes 15-19: Pro Roscio, ¬ß. 31, 32: Charles 12, p. 67: Timon, act 2: Grandison, p. 223. Call on Lister , nah; &
Inchbald , talk of necessity . Holcroft calls

5. W. H Horace, Odes 19-24. Write p. 82, iter., 83, 84, 85/2. Charles 12, p. 89: Grandison, p. 276. Marshal & Jardine call: sup at
miss Godwin‚Äôs
.

6. Th. Horace, Odes 24, 25, 26: Charles 12, p. 132: Grandison, p. 306; Vol. VI, 128. Call on Mrs Barlow
. Mrs Barbauld‚Äôs Sermon.
7. F. Horace, Odes 27, 28: Charles 12, p. 192: Grandison, p. 144, Edit., 8 Vols. Jardine calls.
8. Sa. Horace, Odes 29, 30; Lib. IV, Ode 1: Charles 12, p. 292: Humphry Clinker, p. 137.

June 9. Su. Horace, Odes 2, 3, 7: Charles 12, p. 330: Clinker, p. 176. Dyson calls, talk of insult : dine at Holcroft‚Äôs
.
10. M. Write p. 85/2, 86/2. Horace, Odes 4, 5, 6: finish Charles 12, p. 408: Old Bachelor, acts 1, 2, 3: Clinker, p. 255: Pro Roscio, ¬ß. 33-37.
11. Tu. Horace, Odes 8, 9, 10: Thucydides, p. 355-422; Vol. II, p. 16: Old Bachelor, acts 4 & 5: Clinker, Vol. II, p. 72.
12. W. Write p. 86/2, 87, 88. Horace, Odes, 11, 12, 13, 15: Thucydides, p. 54: Clinker, p. 174. Dyson calls, character .

13. Th. Horace, Ode 15; Epod. 1: Thucydides, p. 74: finish Clinker, p. 236: Hugh Trevor, ms, p. 206. Call on
Inchbald
: sup at Holcroft‚Äôs
.
